data.question: What is the formula of the one-dimensional compound synthesized from manganese(III) acetate meso-tetraphenylporphyrin and phenylphosphinic acid?
What type of magnetic arrangement does the compound [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O exhibit?
What is the space group of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
What is the role of the phenylphosphinate anion in the structure of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
data.answer: It transmits a sizable antiferromagnetic exchange interaction.

data.question: Does the compound [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O show single-chain magnet (SCM) behavior?
What is the Jahn−Teller elongation axes orientation in the Mn(III) octahedra of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
data.answer: The Jahn−Teller elongation axes of the Mn(III) octahedra alternate along the chain.

data.question: What is the best fit parameters for the exchange and single ion anisotropy in [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
Is the dynamic behavior of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O frequency-dependent?
What does the relaxation time of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O follow?
Can the correlation length estimated from magnetic susceptibility directly determine the time scale of relaxation in [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
What is the energy barrier for the reversal of magnetization in [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
What is the significance of the glide plane in the structure of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
data.answer: It results in the alternation of Jahn−Teller elongation axes along the chain.

data.question: Is the magnetic anisotropy in [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O due to the Mn(III) ions?
What is the role of the glide plane symmetry element in the structure of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
data.answer: It generates the infinite [Mn−O−P−O]∞ zigzag chains along the crystallographic c-axis.

data.question: Does the compound [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O contain water molecules in its structure?
What is the effect of the magnetic field on the relaxation time in [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
data.answer: The application of a static magnetic field of 1 kOe has no sizable effects on the dynamic parameters.

data.question: What is the crystal system of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
Is the magnetic susceptibility of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O anisotropic?
What is the role of the porphyrin ligands in the structure of [Mn(TPP)O2PHPh]·H2O?
data.answer: They induce a large separation between the chains, allowing to neglect interchain interaction.

data.question: Can SCM behavior be observed in Heisenberg AF chains with strong single ion anisotropy?
